meta.description: Language labels for Google Maps mapping service.

languageKey.label: No Maps API key has been set for the wec_map extension on this domain. Please make sure that you have set an API key either in the WEC Map Admin, or via TypoScript or Flexform. If you don't have an API key yet, you may obtain one free of charge from the Google Maps website.
There doesn't seem to be anything to display. Make sure the map is configured correctly and there are users or markers set.
The map didn't have a height or width set. Make sure that height and width are set correctly in either the Flexform or via TypoScript.
No corresponding geographic location could be found for one of the specified addresses. This may be due to the fact that the address is relatively new, or it may be incorrect.\nError code:
A geocoding or directions request could not be successfully processed, yet the exact reason for the failure is not known.\n Error code:

The HTTP q parameter was either missing or had no value. For geocoder requests, this means that an empty address was specified as input. For directions requests, this means that no query was specified in the input.\n Error code:
The geocode for the given address or the route for the given directions query cannot be returned due to legal or contractual reasons.\n Error code:
The given key is either invalid or does not match the domain for which it was given. \n Error code:

We could not compute directions between the addresses. This is usually because there is no route available between the two points, or because we do not have data for routing in that region. \n Error code:
A directions request could not be successfully parsed.\n Error code:
An unknown error occurred. Error code:
OSM
OpenStreetmap layer
OSM-bike
OpenCycleMap layer
